meanings.definition: The act or state of not interfering.
meanings.sent1: The noninterferences of the students allowed the teacher to focus on the lesson.
meanings.sent2: The noninterferences in the peaceful neighborhood made everyone feel safe.
meanings.sent3: The noninterferences of the mischievous squirrel made the bird feeder a popular spot.
meanings.sent4: Her noninterferences in the conversation spoke volumes about her disinterest.
meanings.sent5: The noninterferences of the referee led to a fair game for both teams.

meanings.sent1: The noninterferences of the boss allowed the team to work independently.
meanings.sent2: The noninterferences from the government ensured a free and fair election.
meanings.sent3: The noninterferences of the cat with the yarn ball was a rare sight.
meanings.sent4: The noninterferences of the wind on the kite made it soar high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The noninterferences of the chef resulted in a perfectly cooked meal.
